game.name: Himegashima Island
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kokomi is sent to the island of Himegashima, where his cousin demands that he spend his summer making happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kokomi is sent to the island of Himegashima, where his cousin demands that he spend his summer making happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience.

reviewHighlights.text: 전부 픽셀이라니...2d씬 하나씩이라도 넣어주지.... 그래도 h씬 빼고 보면 게임 자체는 재밌게 해서 추천
이 서클특 시골마을에 왠 거근쇼타가와서 다먹음
